name: OptionGroup_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the OptionGroup class.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithNoOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup when no options are added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithSingleOption
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup when a single option is added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithMultipleOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup when multiple options are added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithLongOption
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup when a long option is added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithMixedOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup when mixed options (short and long) are added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithOptionWithoutDescription
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup when an option without a description is added.
